[30;1m97 | [0m[35m  return (fifo << 7 | transfer_type << 6 | channel << 4 | reg << 0);[0m

[30;1m79 | [0m[35m#    recommended version as otherwise a bunch of devices could be bricked[0m
[30;1m80 | [0m[35m#  * For all constants below, update platformio.ini (in this repo)[0m
[30;1m81 | [0m[35m#    and platformio.ini/platformio-lint.ini in the esphome-docker-base repository[0m
[30;1m82 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m83 | [0m[35m# The default/recommended arduino framework version[0m

[30;1m7 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m8 | [0m[35mESPHome's codegen system solves this by using coroutine-like methods. When a component depends on[0m
[30;1m9 | [0m[35ma variable, it waits for it to be registered using `await cg.get_variable()`. If the variable[0m
[30;1m10 | [0m[35mhasn't been registered yet, control will be yielded back to another component until the variable[0m
[30;1m11 | [0m[35mis registered. This leads to a topological sort, solving the dependency problem.[0m
[30;1m12 | [0m[35m[0m
[30;1m13 | [0m[35mImportantly, ESPHome only uses the coroutine *syntax*, no actual asyncio event loop is running in[0m

  Severity: [36mModerate[0m, Confidence: [36mLow[0m
  Filename: [33m/esphome-2025.4.0b1/esphome/schema_extractors.py[0m
   Pattern: [32m\s(advpack\.dll|appvlp|at|atbroker|bash|bginfo|bitsadmin|cdb|certutil|cl_invocation\.ps1|cl_mutexverifiers\.ps1|cmd|cmdkey|cmstp|comsvcs\.dll|control|csc|cscript|csi|devtoolslauncher|dfsvc|diskshadow|dnscmd|dnx|dotnet|dxcap|esentutl|eventvwr|excel|expand|extexport|extrac32|findstr|forfiles|ftp|gfxdownloadwrapper|gpscript|hh|ie4uinit|ieadvpack\.dll|ieaframe\.dll|ic|infdefaultinstall|installutil|jsc|makecab|manage-bde\.wsf|mavinject|mftrace|microsoft\.workflow\.compiler|mmc|msbuild|msconfig|msdeploy|msdt|mshta|mshtml\.dll|msc|msxsl|netsh|odbcconf|pcalua|pcwrun|pcwutl\.dll|pester\.bat|powerpnt|presentationhost|pubprn\.vbs|rcsi|reg|regasm|regedit|register-cimprovider|regsvcs|regsvr32|rpcping|rundll32|runonce|runscripthelper|sc|schtasks|scriptrunner|setupapi\.dll|shdocvw\.dll|shell32\.dll|slmgr\.vbs|sqldumper|sqlps|sqltoolsps|squirrel|syncappvpublishingserver|syncappvpublishingserver\.vbs|syssetup\.dll|te|tracker|tttracer|update|url\.dll|verclsid|vsjitdebugger|wab|winrm\.vbs|winword|wmic|wscript|wsl|wsreset|xwizard|zipfldr\.dll)\s[0m
[30;1m3 | [0m[35mThese are a helper decorators to help get schema from some[0m
[30;1m4 | [0m[35mcomponents which uses voluptuous in a way where validation[0m
[30;1m5 | [0m[35mis hidden in local functions[0m
[30;1m6 | [0m[35mThese decorators should not modify at all what the functions[0m
[30;1m7 | [0m[35moriginally do.[0m
[30;1m8 | [0m[35mHowever there is a property to further disable decorator[0m
[30;1m9 | [0m[35mimpact."""[0m

[31m--[ [0m[34mMatch #[0m[33m2787[0m[34m of [0m[33m3180[0m[31m ]--[0m
